articles.title: Jerry Lee Lewis, notorious US rock’n’roll star, dies aged 87 - The Guardian
articles.description: Artist’s songs such as Great Balls of Fire helped install rock’n’roll as the dominant American pop music of the 1950s
articles.content:
Jerry Lee Lewis, the rocknroll pioneer who became one of the most infamous figures in popular music, has died aged 87, his publicist has said.
He died of natural causes at his home in DeSoto County,… [+4627 chars]

articles.title: Pioneering rocker Jerry Lee Lewis dead at 87 - News24
articles.description: Jerry Lee Lewis, a kingpin of 1950s American rock and roll who played a pivotal role in shaping the genre's sound, died on Friday. He was 87 years old.
articles.content:
• American rocker Jerry Lee Lewis has died. He was 87 years old.
  • Lewis, is best known for his classic Great Balls of Fire.
  • His publicist told AFP he died of natural causes.
